mean_en: a group of people who have been elected to meet together regularly and make decisions or laws for a particular region or country
sentence: Representatives from different countries attended the assembly of the UN.
sentence_trans: 来自不同国家的代表参加了联合国大会。
word_etyma: as不断 + sembl =same一样 + y表名词 → 不断到一个地方→ assembly集合
